POSTGRES_IMAGE.description: Container image used for the PostgreSQL database service.

POSTGRES_USER.description: Database user created by the PostgreSQL container.

POSTGRES_PASSWORD.description: Password associated with POSTGRES_USER for local development.

POSTGRES_DB.description: Default database created on first boot.

POSTGRES_PORT.description: Host port published for PostgreSQL connections.

DATABASE_URL.description: Connection string the backend uses to reach PostgreSQL inside Compose.

SESSION_SECRET.description: Secret used by the backend to sign and verify session cookies.

BACKEND_IMAGE.description: Base image used to run the backend service in the Compose workflow.

BACKEND_PORT.description: Host port exposed for the backend HTTP API.

VIDFRIENDS_LOG_LEVEL.description: Structured log level emitted by the backend service.

VIDFRIENDS_YTDLP_TIMEOUT.description: Maximum time the backend waits for yt-dlp to return metadata.

VIDFRIENDS_METADATA_CACHE_TTL.description: Lifetime for cached video metadata responses.

VIDFRIENDS_MIGRATIONS.description: Directory containing SQL migration files inside the backend container.

VIDFRIENDS_S3_ENDPOINT.description: Internal endpoint the backend uses to talk to MinIO.

VIDFRIENDS_S3_BUCKET.description: Bucket created in MinIO for storing downloaded video assets.

VIDFRIENDS_S3_REGION.description: Region identifier presented to S3-compatible clients.

VIDFRIENDS_S3_PUBLIC_BASE_URL.description: Base URL used to construct public links to stored assets.

YT_DLP_PATH.description: Filesystem path where the yt-dlp binary is mounted for the backend.

YTDLP_IMAGE.description: Helper image that publishes the yt-dlp binary onto the shared volume.

FRONTEND_IMAGE.description: Image used for the frontend development server container.

FRONTEND_PORT.description: Host port exposed for the Vite development server.

FRONTEND_API_BASE_URL.description: Origin the frontend uses to proxy API requests while running in Compose.

MINIO_IMAGE.description: Image that runs the MinIO object storage service.

MINIO_ROOT_USER.description: Administrative access key created for MinIO.

MINIO_API_PORT.description: Host port that exposes the MinIO S3-compatible API.

MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT.description: Host port that exposes the MinIO management console.

MINIO_MC_IMAGE.description: Image used by the bucket provisioning helper job.
